messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] "Expert" Advice
messages.msgSnippet: Some of these experts out to be jailed for child abuse, endangerment and exploitation. Kris I would like to add  oppression, slave labor, holding a person
messages.messageBody:
"Some of these "experts" out to be jailed for child abuse, endangerment and exploitation.

Kris"

I would like to add oppression, slave labor, holding a person against their will, verbal abuse, emotional abuse, mental abuse... The really sad thing is that even though so many adults hated school, so many of us were convinced by the same system that it was best to do the same thing to our own kids.

ambersand
